* Dinobot roared as he felt cold steel rip into his face and was blinded by 
the gush of mech fluid that erupted from the wound at the moment of impact. 
He let go of Tavatron and stepped back, he snarled and tried to wipe the 
mech fluid from his optic so that he could see but every time he did more 
replaced it.
Dinobot roared in frustration as he dropped down to one knee and hung his 
head, he could hear his own mech fluid hitting the ground in wet splashes.
He leaned against a near tree trunk and tried to use it to stand back up but 
his hand slipped in his mech fluid that had splashed on it and he ended up 
back on his knee, he's snarl softened until there was nothing but silence. 
He stayed there, not moving and not making a sound, just existing.
A long and silent time had passed before Dinobot got to his feet and wiped 
the congealing mech fluid from his optic, we walked over to Tavatron and 
held out a hand to help her to her feet.
Not a word came from his lips.*
